These are the default key types used for certain line specials, or for any line special in [[UDMF]] through the [[Linedef#UDMF_properties|{{c|locknumber}} property]]. Use one of these to define what key(s) the player needs to activate the special. You can customize the keys needed for a specific lock with the [[LOCKDEFS]] lump.
A lock number lesser than 1 or greater than 255 is invalid. A door with such a lock will always be unlocked. Using a valid but undefined lock number results in a door that cannot be opened and displays the message “This doesn't seem to work” when activated. The effect of lock number 103 in Strife is hardcoded, but can be overridden.
